name: Escaption
description:
You are propelled in a dystopian universe and you must escape at all costs to join a refugee camp. To do this, you must be quick and careful and activate 6 beacons while avoiding being spotted by threatening bots.

------ Controls ------

This game is for QWERTY keyboard config, if you are on AZERTY config just press ALT + MAJ for switch to QWERTY. Use left click for interacte with environment and MAJ for running.
